sizes_available: S – M – L – XL – XXL – XXXL
full_text: Knitted jacket in DROPS Sky or DROPS Daisy. Piece is knitted top down in stocking stitch with round yoke, double neck edge and i-cord. Size XS – XXXL. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #caramelhazecardigan DROPS design: Pattern sk-199 Yarn group B SIZE : XS - S - M - L - XL - XXL YARN : DROPS SKY from Garnstudio (belongs to yarn group B) 300-350-400-400-450-500 g colour 32, Nougat Or use: DROPS DAISY from Garnstudio (belongs to yarn group B) 550-600-650-700-750-850 g colour 13, Almond BUTTONS : DROPS BUTTON NO 818: 7-7-7-8-8-8 pieces NEEDLES : DROPS CIRCULAR NEEDLE SIZE 4 mm: Length 40 and 80 cm. DROPS CIRCULAR NEEDLE SIZE 3 mm: Length: 80 cm DROPS DOUBLE POINTED NEEDLES SIZE 4 mm DROPS DOUBLE POINTED NEEDLES SIZE 3 mm The technique MAGIC LOOP can be used – you then only need circular needle of 80 cm in each size. KNITTING TENSION : 21 stitches in width and 28 rows vertically in stocking stitch on needle size 4 mm = 10 x 10 cm. NOTE! Remember that needle size is only a suggestion. If you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger needles. If you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller needles.
name: Ravelry: 262-22 Caramel Haze Cardigan pattern by DROPS design
